Class VenusFlyTrap

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      info.gridworld.actor.Flower
          VenusFlyTrap

public class VenusFlyTrap
extends info.gridworld.actor.Flower

VenusFlyTrap eats bugs that are in front and behind it. If it has eaten within the last step, then it lights up.

Version:
September 26, 2016
Author:
Alex Yu

Constructor Summary
VenusFlyTrap()
          Constructs VenusFlyTrap that eats bugs
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Tries to eat and if it has eaten, then becomes fully green.
 void eat()
          Oversees the eating by checking spaces in front and behind the plant for bugs.
 void eatBug(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
          Checks to see if there is a bug at the given location and then consumes it if there is one.

getColor, getDirection, getGrid, getLocation, moveTo, putSelfInGrid, removeSelfFromGrid, setColor, setDirection, toString

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
